pkgmetadata.longdescription: Visualisation of Highest Density Regions in 'ggplot2' // Provides 'ggplot2' framework for visualising Highest Density Regions (HDR) doi:10.1080/00031305.1996.10474359. This work is based on the package 'hdrcde'https://pkg.robjhyndman.com/hdrcde/ and displays highest density regions in 'ggplot2' for one and two dimensions and univariate densities conditional on one covariate.
